summary.span: 是 基类的 WPF 框架级别的实现和扩展。

span.span: is the WPF framework-level implementation and expansion of the base class.

summary.span: 增加了针对下列各项的支持：附加输入 API（包括工具提示和上下文菜单）、演示图板、用于数据绑定的数据上下文、格式支持和逻辑树帮助程序 API。

span.span: adds support for additional input APIs (including tooltips and context menus), storyboards, data context for data binding, styles support, and logical tree helper APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尚未定义自己的呈现行为;可以在代码或标记中实例化实际类实例, 但不会[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在应用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]程序中显示任何内容。 does not yet define its own rendering behavior; instantiating an actual class instance in code or markup is possible but displays nothing in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 呈现逻辑必须由作为其内容模型或派生类中的子元素的类提供。Rendering logic must be provided by classes that take child elements as part of their content model, or in derived classes. 有意将许多与相同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 的类似。 deliberately parallels many of the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] as . 请注意, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]在上发现的某些不会有等效项。Note that certain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] found on will not have a equivalent. 的 几个适用于诸如几何表示法或布局的功能, 这些功能与不相关。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]Several of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] are for functionality such as geometry representation or layout, which are not relevant for a . 大多数现有的派生类将在命名空间中找到。The majority of existing derived classes will be found in the namespace. 其中许多派生类实现了流文档模型的元素。Many of these derived classes implement elements for the flow document model. 某些派生类 (例如 ) 具有一些类似控件的功能, 但派生自 , 因此, 类似控件的元素仍可参与流文档模型。Certain derived classes such as have some control-like functionality, but are derived from such that the control-like elements can still participate in the flow document model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在另一个进程循环访问逻辑树时调用, 则此方法可能会引发异常。This method can throw an exception if called at a time when the logical tree is being iterated by another process. 大多数派生类公开了负责包含的专用集合 (例如, 在类上; 在类上)。Most derived classes expose dedicated collections that are responsible for containment (for example, on the class; on the class). 如果改为从这些类派生, 则通常可以避免任何需要直接操作逻辑树。You can typically avoid any need to manipulate the logical tree directly if you derive from these classes instead. 使用 content 元素的逻辑树是一种高级方案, 可能需要专用分析器或作为父呈现元素 (内容宿主) 的专用分析器。Working with the logical tree for content elements is an advanced scenario that may require a specialized parser or a specialized that acts as the parent rendering element (content host). 有关如何使用和的详细信息, 请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information about how to use and , see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不使用`isControllable`、参数或指定`false`了该参数的签名, 与动画关联的时间线时钟一旦到达 "填充" 时间段就会被删除。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period. 因此, 在运行一次后无法重新启动动画。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once. 请注意, 控制动画还要求情节提要作为代码中的实例进行命名或访问。Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不使用`isControllable`、参数或指定`false`了该参数的签名, 与动画关联的时间线时钟一旦到达 "填充" 时间段就会被删除。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period. 因此, 在运行一次后无法重新启动动画。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once. 请注意, 控制动画还要求情节提要作为代码中的实例进行命名或访问。Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code. ## 使用撰写 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 使用将、或应用到属性时 , 以前与该属性关联的任何对象将继续使用系统资源; 计时系统将执行 不要自动删除时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property by using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically. 若要避免在使用应用大量时钟时出现性能问题, 应在完成后从动画属性中删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有几种方法可以删除时钟:There are several ways to remove a clock: - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟, 请使用动画对象的或方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 将要进行动画处理的属性指定为第一个`null`参数, 并将指定为第二个参数。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从属性中移除所有动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要从时钟列表中删除特定的, 请使用的属性来检索, 然后调用的方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 通常在时钟的事件处理程序中完成此操作。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意, 只能通过控制根时钟, 子时钟的属性返回。 `null`Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意, 如果时钟的有效持续时间是永久性的, 则不会引发事件。Note also that the event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下, 用户必须确定何时调用。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对对象进行垃圾回收时, 还会断开其时钟的连接并对其进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息, 请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于验证对象的多个属性的值。A can be used to validate the values of multiple properties of an object. 例如, 假设应用程序提示用户输入地址, 然后`Address`使用属性`Street`、 `City`、 `ZipCode`和`Country`值填充类型为的对象, 其中的值为用户规定.For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address and then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序有一个面板, 其中包含四个控件, 其中每个控件都绑定到对象的一个属性。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is bound to one of the object's properties. 可以 `Address`在中使用来验证对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 例如, 可以确保邮政编码对地址的国家/地区有效。For example, the can ensure that the zip code is valid for the country/region of the address. 子元素继承其父元素, 就像任何其他可继承的属性一样。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取消关闭上下文菜单, 该事件的处理程序应将其标记为已处理。To suppress closing context menus, handlers of the event should mark it as handled. 若要在样式中使用此事件, 必须引用基础服务事件标识符:To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuClosing](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuclosing)] (此用法是必需的 , 因为公开基础服务事件的中的事件实现未正确映射用于触发器的标识符)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the identifier for use in triggers). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例实现了一个处理程序, 该处理程序将光标`DisplayArea`更改为命名区域 (未显示)。The following example implements a handler that changes the cursor over a named region `DisplayArea` (not shown). 使用中的注释提示, 但实际上, 如果`DisplayArea`是, 则此示例是相同的。The comment hints at a usage, but in fact this sample would be identical if `DisplayArea` were a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件标识符对象是在注册路由事件时创建的 ( 请参阅), 然后可用于添加类处理程序 ( 请参见)。Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see ) and can then be used to add class handlers (see ). 标识符对象包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和用于为事件添加所有者的实用工具方法。Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.

span.span: Occurs when any context menu on the element is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要手动打开上下文菜单, 事件的处理程序应将相关事件标记为 "已处理"。To manually open context menus, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled. 否则, 将使用属性的现有值自动打开上下文菜单。Otherwise, the existing value of the property will be used to automatically open a context menu. 将事件标记为已处理会有效地取消默认操作, 并且可能会有机会重置属性的值, 然后打开新的。Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the property and then open the new . 但是, 有一个应该注意的计时问题。However, there is a timing issue you should be aware of. 为了通过处理程序完全替换上下文菜单, 初始上下文菜单不得为 null/空。In order to completely replace the context menu through a handler, the initial context menu must not be null / empty. 或者, 您可能需要处理事件, 然后手动打开新的上下文菜单。Alternatively, you might need to handle the event and then manually open a new context menu. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：处理 ContextMenuOpening 事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md)。For details, see [How to: Handle the ContextMenuOpening Event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md). 若要在样式中使用此事件, 必须引用基础服务事件标识符:To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuOpening](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuopening)] (此用法是必需的 , 因为公开基础服务事件的中的事件实现未正确映射用于触发器的标识符)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the identifier for use in triggers). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] , 处理器依赖于类的类型转换来计算字符串。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor relies on type conversion for the class to evaluate the string. 提供的字符串的计算结果应为值。The provided string should evaluate to a value. 有关详细信息，请参阅。See for details. 当鼠标指针位于此元素上时, 是否显示此属性所建立的光标也依赖于该属性的值。Whether the cursor as established by this property will or will not display when the mouse pointer is over this element is also dependent on the value of the property. 此外, 与事件相关的注意事项, 如活动拖动、鼠标捕获、控件内的文本编辑模式等, 也会影响其优先级高于在此属性中指定的值的光标。Also, event-related considerations such as an active drag, mouse capture, text editing modes within controls, and so on, will also affect the cursor with higher priority than the value you specify in this property. 若要将此属性的设置方式恢复为最终的默认值, 请`null`将其重新设置为。To revert the behavior of setting this property to the eventual default, set it to `null` again. `null`默认情况下, 这意味着确定实际游标值是在此处推迟的, 应从其他位置获得。The `null` default really means that determination of the practical cursor value is deferred here and should be obtained from elsewhere. 如果未在任何源中显示任何编程值, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序上的默认光标将为箭头。If presented with no programmatic values from any source, the default cursor over a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application will be an arrow. 鼠标在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序上的每个移动都将引发一个事件。Each movement of the mouse over a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application raises a event. 事件冒泡, 路由中的任何元素都有机会处理事件, 并通过此事件的参数设置光标的值。The event bubbles, and any element along the route has the opportunity to handle the event and to set the value of the cursor via the arguments of this event. 如果发生这种情况, 则处理事件并在参数中具有更改的值的事实将优先于任何级别的属性的值, 除非已设置。If that happens, the fact that the event is handled and has a changed value in the arguments takes precedence over the value of the property at any level, unless is set. 如果未创建自定义游标, 通常会将此属性设置为类的静态属性值。If not creating a custom cursor, typically you set this property to a static property value of the class. 在部分信任环境中未启用将设置为自定义值。Setting the to a custom value is not enabled in partial trust. 有关自定义游标的详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on custom cursors, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例将光标设置为自定义值。The following example sets the cursor to a custom value. summary.span: 获取或设置元素参与数据绑定时的数据上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets the data context for an element when it participates in data binding.

value.span: 要用作数据上下文的对象。

span.span: The object to use as data context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *数据上下文*是一种概念, 允许元素从父元素继承有关用于绑定的绑定源的信息, 以及绑定的其他特征 (如路径)。*Data context* is a concept that allows elements to inherit information from their parent elements about the binding source that is used for binding, as well as other characteristics of the binding such as the path. 可以将数据上下文直接设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象, 并将绑定计算为该对象的属性。Data context can be set directly to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, with the bindings evaluating to properties of that object. 或者, 您可以将数据上下文设置为对象。Alternatively, you can set the data context to a object. 此依赖属性继承属性值。This dependency property inherits property values. 如果有子元素没有通过本地值或样式建立的其他值, 则属性系统会将该值设置为已分配此值的最近父元素的值。If there are child elements with no other value for established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned. 或者, 您可以使用类的下列属性之一显式指定绑定源: 、 或。Alternatively, you can use one of the following properties of the class to specify the binding source explicitly: , , or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：指定绑定源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md). 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中 ,最常将设置为作为声明。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], is most commonly set to as a declaration. 您可以使用属性元素语法或特性语法。You can use either property element syntax or attribute syntax. 此页上的示例显示了特性语法。Attribute syntax is shown in the example on this page. 你还可以在代码中设置。You can also set in code. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```xaml ``` 或-or- ```xaml ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dataContextObject**dataContextObject* 作为父元素中任何绑定的数据上下文的直接嵌入对象。A directly embedded object that serves as data context for any bindings within the parent element. 通常, 此对象是或其他子类。Typically, this object is a or another subclass. 或者, 可将用于绑定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]的任何对象类型的原始数据放置在此处, 并在以后定义实际绑定。Alternatively, raw data of any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object type intended for binding may be placed here, with the actual bindings defined later. *bindingUsage**bindingUsage* 计算结果为适当数据上下文的绑定使用情况。A binding usage that evaluates to an appropriate data context. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Binding 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)。For details, see [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md). *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 以下项之一: `StaticResource`、或。 `DynamicResource`One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 当引用定义为资源中的对象的原始数据时, 将使用此用法。This usage is used when referring to raw data defined as an object in resources. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *contextResourceKey**contextResourceKey* 要从中请求的对象的键标识符。The key identifier for the object being requested from within a . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例通过创建一个新的自定义数据对象, 将该对象建立为, 并将绑定路径设置为其中的属性, 来设置对元素的绑定。The following example sets a binding on a element, by creating a new custom data object, establishing that object as , and setting the binding path to a property within it. [!code-csharp[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#DataContext](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml.cs#datacontext)] [!code-vb[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#DataContext](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#datacontext)]

summary.span: 当此元素的数据上下文更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element's data context changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关数据上下文和数据绑定的说明, 请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For an explanation of data contexts and data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当某个元素发生更改时, 此元素上的所有数据绑定属性都可能会受到影响。When an element's changes, all data-bound properties on this element are potentially affected. 这适用于作为当前元素的子代元素的所有元素, 这些元素继承数据上下文以及当前元素本身。This applies to any elements that are descendant elements of the current element, which inherit the data context, and also the current element itself. 所有此类绑定都会重新解释新的, 以反映绑定中的新值。All such bindings re-interpret the new to reflect the new value in bindings. 相对于引发事件, 不能保证这些更改的顺序。There is no guarantee made about the order of these changes relative to the raising of the event. 更改可以在事件之前、事件之后或任何组合中发生。The changes can occur before the event, after the event, or in any mixture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常不通过其任何直接的 setter 设置。This property is typically not set through any of its direct setters. 相反, 每次创建新子类时, 都要重写此依赖项属性的特定于类型的元数据。Instead, you override the type-specific metadata of this dependency property every time you create a new subclass. 在对子类的静态构造函数中, 对标识符调用方法。When you subclass, call the method against the identifier, within the static constructor of the control subclass. 例如, 像这样的内联类实际上在其静态构造函数中重写元数据并公开了多个实例构造函数的实现非常少。For instance, an inline class such as actually has very little implementation beyond overriding the metadata in its static constructor, and exposing several instance constructors. 通过将的默认值 设置为`typeof(Bold)`,在引用的主题样式内实现了标记周围的元素获得的属性。 The fact that elements surrounded by the tag gain a property of is implemented within the theme style that was referenced by setting the default value of to `typeof(Bold)`. 如果希望你的元素或控件特意不使用主题样式, 请将属性设置为。 `true`If you want your element or control to deliberately not use theme styles, set the property to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法可提供在元素加载过程中初始化元素时应发生的特殊处理。Implement this method to provide special handling that should occur when your element is initialized during the element loading process. 你的实现应调用基实现, 因为基 (默认) 实现设置了一些内部标志来跟踪初始化。Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization. 如果以前调用过, 则基实现将引发事件。If was previously called, the base implementation will raise the event. 否则, 如果未调用或无法确定是否调用了, 则不会引发事件。Otherwise, if was not called or it could not be determined whether was called, the event is not raised.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象允许自定义此元素在捕获到键盘焦点时要应用于此元素的外观、效果或其他样式特征。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that enables customization of appearance, effects, or other style characteristics that will apply to this element when it captures keyboard focus.

value.span: 要应用于焦点的所需样式。

span.span: The desired style to apply on focus.

value.span: 该依赖属性中声明的默认值是一个空的静态 。

span.span: The default value as declared in the dependency property is an empty static .

value.span: 但是，运行时的有效值通常是（但并非总是）控件的主题支持所提供的样式。

span.span: However, the effective value at run time is often (but not always) a style as supplied by theme support for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]设置此属性时, 样式几乎始终定义为资源, 而不是作为元素内联, 并且该资源通常作为进行引用。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], styles are almost always defined as a resource, rather than inline as an element, and that resource is usually referenced as a . 请注意, 此属性会影响视觉外观, 但不会在元数据中进行报告。Note that this property affects visual appearance but does not report so in metadata. 这是因为视觉外观更改是事件驱动的, 可能不会在任何时候都适用, 因此通常不会在元数据中报告任何视觉对象或布局信息。This is because the visual appearance change is event-driven and may not apply at all times, and thus should not generally report any visual or layout information in metadata. 从概念上讲, 应用于控件的焦点的视觉行为应该与元素相关。Conceptually, the visual behavior of focus applied to a control should be coherent from element to element. 强制一致性的最明智方式是仅在编写整个主题时更改焦点视觉样式。The most sensible way to enforce coherence is to only change the focus visual style if you are composing an entire theme. 对单独的样式设置此属性, 而不是主题的一部分, 这并不是此属性的预期用法, 因为这可能会导致与键盘焦点有关的用户体验混乱。Setting this property on individual styles and not as part of a theme is not the intended usage of this property, because it may lead to a confusing user experience regarding keyboard focus. 如果您要采用特意在主题上不一致的特定于元素的行为, 更好的方法是使用各个输入状态属性 ( 如或) 的样式中的触发器, 并以不直观干扰任何现有的焦点视觉样式。If you are intending element-specific behavior that is deliberately not coherent across a theme, a much better approach is to use triggers in styles for individual input state properties, such as or , and to do so in a way that does not visually interfere with any existing focus visual style. 有关和替代焦点属性的设计意图的详细信息, 请参阅[在控件中的焦点样式和 FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md)。For more information on the design intention of and alternative focus properties, see [Styling for Focus in Controls, and FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 以下项之一:、或。One of the following: , or . 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的, 但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 使用[TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)或的绑定引用也可能发生, 但情况并不常见。A binding reference using [TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md) or is also possible, but uncommon. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性最常见的用法是在标记中指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素名称。The most common usage of this property is when specifying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element name in markup. 此属性实质上提供了一个 WPF 框架级别的便利属性来[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]设置[x:Name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。This property essentially provides a WPF framework-level convenience property to set the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md). 从代码中获取并不常见, 因为如果你在代码中具有相应的引用, 则可以只调用元素引用上的方法和属性, 并且通常不需要。 Getting a from code is not common, because if you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and do not generally need the . 如果字符串具有一些重载含义 (例如, 如果在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]显示该名称很有用), 则异常。An exception is if the string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如果也不建议从标记中设置原始的代码, 则更改属性不会更改对象引用。 Setting a from code if the original was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property will not change the object reference. 仅当在加载过程中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]显式创建了基础名称范围时, 才会创建此类对象引用。Such object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading. 您必须专门调用以对已加载的元素的属性进行有效更改。You must specifically call to make an effective change on the property of an already loaded element. 从代码中进行设置的一个明显情况是, 对要针对其运行情节提要的元素进行命名。One notable case where setting from code is important is for naming elements that storyboards will run against. 注册名称之前, 可能还需要实例化并分配实例。Before you can register a name, might also need to instantiate and assign a instance. 请参阅 "示例" 部分或[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。See the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 从代码设置具有有限的应用程序, 但按名称查找元素更常见, 尤其是在使用导航模型时, 页面将重新加载到应用程序中, 而运行时代码不一定是该的代码隐藏各自的页面。Setting from code has limited applications, but looking up an element by name is more common, particularly if you are employing a navigation model where pages reload into the application and the run-time code is not necessarily the code-behind of that respective page. 实用工具方法 ( 可从任何方法获取) 可以以递归方式找到该元素的逻辑树中的任何元素。The utility method , which is available from any , can find any element by in that element's logical tree recursively. 您也可以使用的静态方法 , 该方法也会将字符串作为参数。Or you can use the static method of , which also takes the string as an argument. 常用的根元素 ( 例如) 实现接口。Commonly used root elements (, for example) implement the interface . 此接口的实现应强制要求名称在其范围内明确。Implementations of this interface are expected to enforce that names be unambiguous within their scope. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法, 则仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的有些类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \* 方法上的事件模式: 它提供了用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可能由子元素引发, 而不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 实现必须考虑事件参数的源属性 (在大多数情况下, 不应尝试重新引发事件)。Therefore, your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 如果在路由中收到事件, 则的子类可以选择调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种可能的情况是获取事件的参数, 并特意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法, 则仍应调用 base ()。You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的有些类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \* 方法上的事件模式: 它提供了用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可能由子元素引发, 而不一定是将调用处理程序的元素, 因此, 实现必须采用事件参数 "source属性 (在大多数情况下, 不应尝试重新引发事件)。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 如果在路由中收到事件, 则的子类可以选择调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种可能的情况是获取事件的参数, 并特意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法并不用于通常检测属性更改或失效。This method is not intended to generally detect property changes or invalidations. 它用于在了解有关属性的广泛分类的特定信息时进行常规失效模式的修改。It is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties. 在对象的整个生存期内, 可能会多次调用此方法。This method is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object. 因此, 如果你重写特定属性的元数据, 然后为单个属性附加或函数, 则可以获得更好的性能。Therefore, you can achieve better performance if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach or functions for individual properties. 但是, 如果包含大量与值相关的依赖项属性, 则可以使用此方法, 或者, 如果包含的逻辑 (如呈现行为) 必须针对属性失效的几个相关事例重新运行, 则应使用此方法。However, you would use this method if a includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations. 请注意, 有一个名称`OnPropertyChanged`相同的方法, 该方法具有不同的签名 (参数类型为), 该方法可出现在多个类中。Note that there is an identically named `OnPropertyChanged` method with a different signature (the parameter type is ) that can appear on a number of classes. 用于数据对象通知, 并且是的协定的一部分。 `OnPropertyChanged`That `OnPropertyChanged` is used for data object notifications, and is part of the contract for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意, 根据应用程序功能, 元素的逻辑父级可能会发生更改, 并且保持此属性的值将不会反映此更改。Note that the logical parent of an element can potentially change depending on your application functionality, and keeping the value of this property will not reflect that change. 通常应在需要之前立即获取值。You typically should get the value immediately before you need it. 有关遍历逻辑树的详细信息, 请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)和适用于元素发现的情况。See [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md) for more information about traversing logical trees, and the scenarios where taking this approach towards element discovery is appropriate. 属性系统在重定父级后可能会重新计算某个元素的所有属性值, 因为某些属性通过逻辑树继承值。The property system will potentially recalculate all property values of an element when it is reparented, because some properties inherit values through the logical tree. 当对元素进行重定父级时,适用于绑定的也可能更改。The that applies for bindings can also change when elements are reparented. 通常仅通过操作集合、使用专用的 add 或 remove 方法或通过设置元素的内容属性来更改元素的父元素。Changing an element's parent is typically only done through manipulation of collections, by using dedicated add or remove methods, or through setting content properties of elements. 使用属性的最典型方案是获取引用, 然后从父级获取各种属性值。The most typical scenario for using the property is to obtain a reference and then get various property values from the parent. 对于模板, 模板的最终将是`null`。For templates, the of the template eventually will be `null`. 若要过去此点并扩展到实际应用模板的逻辑树, 请使用。To get past this point and extend into the logical tree where the template is actually applied, use . ## Examples 下面的示例检查的是否 为特定类型。The following example checks to see whether the of a is of a particular type. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_snippets#FCEParent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#fceparent)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_snippets#FCEParent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#fceparent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一种方便调用的方法。This method is a convenience method for calling . 该实现将检查后续的父元素, 直到它找到适用的实现 (通过查找实现的元素找到)。The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements . 有关名称范围的详细信息, 请参阅[WPF XAML 名称范围](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 若要在代码中创建应用程序时正确地挂钩动画情节提要, 则调用是必需的。Calling is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code. 这是因为其中一个密钥情节提要属性使用了运行时名称查找, 而不是能够引用目标元素。This is because one of the key storyboard properties, , uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element. 即使可通过代码引用访问该元素, 也是如此。This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code. 有关为何需要为情节提要目标注册名称的详细信息, 请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 内容元素的动画比控件上的动画更常见,[演示图板概述重点介绍](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)了控制方案。Animations for content elements are less common than animations on controls, the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md) concentrates on control scenarios.

span.span: This is a dictionary of resources, where resources within the dictionary are accessed by key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以完全或部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义的资源字典通常创建为属性元素, 并且通常位于任何单个页面或应用程序的根元素上。Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application. 将资源字典置于此级别, 可以更方便地从页面中的单个子元素 (或应用程序用例中的任何页面) 查找。Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case). 在大多数应用程序方案中, 我们建议将样式定义为资源字典中的对象元素, 或将其定义为外部资源, 以便整个样式资源可以是自包含的 (此方法有助于分离设计器通过分隔需要编辑的物理文件来使开发人员的责任。In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited). 请注意, 此属性仅返回直接在该元素中声明的资源字典。Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element. 这不同于实际资源查找过程, 其中, 子元素可以访问每个父元素中定义的任何资源, 并以递归方式向上搜索。This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards. 还可以通过代码从集合中引用资源, 但请注意, 在声明字典的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]引发后 , 中创建的资源将无法访问。Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after is raised by the element that declares the remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前样式通常由主题中的默认样式提供, 或者由通常应用于页面或应用程序级别的资源的样式 (一种隐式样式) 应用于该类型的对象。The current style is often provided by a default style from theming, or from styles generally applied to objects of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style). 此属性未设置或返回默认 (主题) 样式, 但它确实返回了隐式样式或显式样式。This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return the implicit style or an explicit style. 对于隐式或显式样式, 无论样式是作为资源访问的还是在本地定义的, 都不重要。In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is accessed as a resource or defined locally. 设置样式有一些限制。Setting the styles has some restrictions. 可随时将整个属性重置为新的, 这将强制进行布局重新组合。You can reset the entire property to a new at any time, which will force a layout recomposition. 但是, 一旦加载的元素使用该样式, 就应将其视为密封。However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the should be considered sealed. 尝试对正在使用的样式的任何单个属性进行更改 (如集合中的任何内容) 将导致引发异常。Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of ) causes an exception to be thrown. 如果在标记中定义的样式是从资源字典 (对于资源) 加载的, 或者它包含在其中的页面加载 (对于内联样式), 则会将其视为已使用。A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles). 是具有特殊优先级的依赖项属性。 is a dependency property with special precedence. 本地设置的样式通常在属性系统中具有最高的优先级。The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system. 如果此时为 null, 则在加载过程中, 将属性系统检查隐式样式作为指定该类型的定义资源。If the is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles as defined resources that specify that type. 如果在执行此步骤后样式仍然为空, 则样式来自默认 (主题) 样式, 但在属性值中不返回默认样式。If the style is still null after this step, then the style comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the property value. 请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 模板实际上是共享对象, 模板的内容仅创建一次。Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once. 因此, 如果您获取对来自模板的元素的对象引用, 则可能会发现明显的逻辑树不会到达页根。Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root. 为了将此类模板引用连接到页面的逻辑树, 您应该获取值, 并根据需要继续导航该元素树。In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired. 经常`null`用于常见对象, 因为如果从应用程序中的页面外获取了对象引用 (通过典型方法), 则该元素可能不是通过模板创建的。 will frequently be `null` for common objects, because if you have obtained an object reference from out of a page in your application through typical means, that element probably was not created from a template. 可能`null`不会包括命中测试、某些低级输入事件的事件处理或使用枚举器等操作, 这些情况可能已返回来自模板的元素。Cases where might not be `null` would include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, or working with enumerators, which may have returned elements that came from templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值为类型, 则这是将[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]在中使用的工具提示。If the value of this property is of type , then that is the tool-tip that will be used in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如果值为任何其他类型, 则该值将用作系统提供的 (构造) 的*内容*。If the value is of any other type, then that value will be used as the *content* for a provided (constructed) by the system. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information see . 服务类提供附加属性, 这些属性可用于进一步自定义工具提示。The service class provides attached properties that can be used to further customize a tool-tip. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ```xaml ``` - 或 --or- ```xaml ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *toolTipContent**toolTipContent* 一个字符串, 该字符串将成为的显示文本。A string that becomes the display text for the . *toolTipObjectContent**toolTipObjectContent* 某些对象 (以对象元素形式提供) 应用作的内容 。Some object, provided in object element form, that should be used as the content for the . 通常, 这是一个或一些其他元素, 它将创建的布局合成, 最终包含组合内的文本内容。Typically this would be a or some other element that creates layout compositing for the , eventually containing text content within the compositing. 在此用法中, 元素是从分析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的隐式创建的, 而*toolTipObjectContent*内容则设置为其属性。In this usage, the element is created implicitly from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the *toolTipObjectContent* content is set as its property. <`ToolTip` .../><`ToolTip` .../> 请参阅 。See . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例将属性的值直接设置为字符串。The following example sets the value of the property directly to a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要禁止关闭工具提示, 事件的处理程序应将其标记为已处理。To suppress closing the tooltip, handlers of the event should mark it as handled. 此事件不能在样式中为。This event cannot be an in a style. 这是因为此事件的 "标识符" 字段会重新使用服务中的实现, 该实现不会公开事件的添加/移除方法。This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove methods on the event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件标识符对象是在注册路由事件时创建的 ( 请参阅), 然后可用于添加类处理程序 ( 请参见)。Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see ) and can then be used to add class handlers (see ). 标识符对象包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和用于为事件添加所有者的实用工具方法。Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ToolTipOpening As ToolTipEventHandler

summary.span: 在元素上的任何工具提示打开时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any tooltip on the element is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要手动打开工具提示, 事件处理程序应将相关事件标记为 "已处理"。To manually open tooltips, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled. 否则, 属性的值将用于自动打开上下文菜单。Otherwise, the value of the property will be used to automatically open a context menu. 将事件标记为已处理会有效地取消默认操作, 并且可能会有机会重置属性的值, 然后打开新的。Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the property and then open the new . 请注意, 如果为空引用或未设置, 则不会引发此事件。Note that this event will not be raised if is a null reference or otherwise unset. 此事件不能在样式中为。This event cannot be an in a style. 这是因为此事件的 "标识符" 字段会重新使用服务中的实现, 该实现不会公开事件的添加/移除方法。This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove methods on the event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

summary.span: 搜索具有指定键的资源，如果找到，则返回该资源。

span.span: Searches for a resource with the specified key, and returns that resource if found.
The found resource.

returns.span: 如果找不到资源，则返回 。

span.span: If no resource was found, is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在调用元素上找不到该资源, 则使用逻辑树搜索父树, 其方式与在运行时该键请求动态资源引用时搜索树的方式相同。If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent tree is searched using the logical tree, in the same way that the tree would be searched if a dynamic resource reference were requested by key at run-time. 通常, 您会立即将返回值强制转换为您尝试通过返回的资源值设置的属性的类型。Typically you would immediately cast the return value to the type of the property that you were attempting to set with the returned resource value. 方法具有类似的行为, 只不过它会在找不到具有所提供键的资源时引发异常。The method has similar behavior, except that it will throw an exception in the case of not finding a resource with the provided key. ## Examples 下面的示例查找标记中定义的资源, 并将其应用到元素的特定属性, 以响应路由事件。The following example finds a resource as defined in markup and applies it to a certain property of an element in response to a routed event. [!code-csharp[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#TryFindResource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml.cs#tryfindresource)] [!code-vb[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#TryFindResource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#tryfindresource)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直接路由事件不遵循路由, 它们只能在引发它们的同一元素内进行处理。Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised. 直接路由事件支持其他路由事件行为: 它们支持可访问的处理程序集合, 并且可用作样式中的。Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an in a style. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||
